website_summaries.verdict: A top brand in car wax and a reasonable choice for car enthusiasts who prefer a traditional paste wax in a synthetic formula.
pros: Car owners praise this paste wax for the high shine it provides
Produces excellent water beading on most finishes
cons: The paste wax formula is a bit more difficult to apply and remove than liquid formulas.Some users gripe that the shine doesn't last as long as expected

customer_reviews.title: Great Wax
customer_reviews.text: I waxed my car 3 months ago and the water is still beading and running off my car, even though it has been through at least 10 automatic car washes. This wax is not only long lasting, it shines great too!
customer_reviews.author: Honest Buyer

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. My car really shines. I made the mistake of buying Mothers 10016 reflections car wax before this and after all the work I did the car looked terrible. I was embarrassed to say I waxed my car. Meguiar's ultimate paste was surprisingly easy to apply and wipe off. This is the only car wax I'll use from now on.
customer_reviews.author: E. A. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Shine bright like a diamond!
customer_reviews.text: Works as advertised great product and superb results! My Mustang looks even more luster then the day I purchased it; looks like a show car.I love Meguiar's products and this is another must have.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: I’m unimpressed with the shape of product.
customer_reviews.text: Was meant for a gift, looked like it was left in a garage for years before shipped to me. The stickers that kept the box close was open and resealed, dirt filled the adhesive that the sticker once was holding the box flaps closed. Clear scrape lines along the side and quite rough looking box. As far as product goes, that’s unknown to me seeing it is a gift. I will be embarrassed once they open it. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Not bad.
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty good wax as far as paste wax goes. It's a bit thinner than some of the paste waxes I've used in the past, which makes it easier to buff out, but also makes it a tad less effective. It's a bit more pricey than some of the similar competitors, but I don't mind paying the price for Meguiar's, because you always know you're going to get a good quality product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Higdon

customer_reviews.title: Meguiars Quality is second to none
customer_reviews.text: Great Meguiars product yet again. Meguiars is a trusted name in the detailing industry. This is probably their most impressive product yet. I use this a lot on friends and family vehicles. For the price, it cannot be beat!! Not only does it protect longer than carnauba wax, it gives an awesome shine! Also, it comes with an applicator and a black microfiber towel...GREAT PRODUCT, GREAT DEAL!!
customer_reviews.author: digdug

customer_reviews.title: Shines great, and a breeze to apply and take off.
customer_reviews.text: I keep my car in great shape, almost always clean - but I hate waxing it! So, it's usually spray waxed because I'm a lazy bastard when it comes to waxing. Plus, some spray waxes are excellent. Well... Meguiar's Ultimate Paste applies so easily (it's really soft) and wipes off with so little effort - that it's as easy as spray wax. Maybe even easier, since it dries to a haze (quickly) and you can see exactly where you applied it - thus avoiding missing a spot. And yeah, it DOES give a brighter and deeper - as well as longer lasting shine than the spray waxes. Water beading/shedding is remarkable.
customer_reviews.author: L. Morano

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Wax on, wipe off. Results, looks like glass, with a good paint job. A a good clear coat. I also prepped with a clay product. Like w/any wax, still requires some work. But the result is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: The Hispster

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on, hard to remove.
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine recommended the Meguiar’s paste wax so I figured I’d give it a try. It’s easy to put on but not easy to take off (I was hand waxing). I should have known better from my previous experience with paste wax. The shine is nice but not worth the all the effort. I won’t be purchasing this again. I’ll stick to the liquid wax/polish next time.
customer_reviews.author: The music man

customer_reviews.title: Great Paste Wax.  Easy to Use!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this paste as a christmas gift for the family. Used it with Meguiar's clay bar to wax the whole fleet. First off, it smells good. It's not quite that premium carnauba smell, but it's synthetic anyway. Good smell. Second, it's quite easy to work with. A little goes a long way, and it wipes off easy. Just make sure you don't apply it too thick (it'll be harder to remove). Great finish so far.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: What a letdown (unusual for Meguiars)
customer_reviews.text: nothing like the liquid Meguiars Ultimate Wax! I now own both and i can't stand the paste wax, which is terrible with a Capital "T"! I won't ever order it ever again and i mean ever! I haven't had this problem with any Meguiare products before and i have ordered a number of the products in the past. I was quite a letdown to say the least!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin P.

customer_reviews.title: Want a show room shine?? This is for you!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Want a perfect shine? Showroom Shine? reasonable price? Easy to use?? Then this is the product for you!!! My Black 2003 Nissan Pathfinder looked like new when I used this product. Lasted a long time even though I live in a winter "heavily salted roads" climate. Buy again in a heartbeat!!!
customer_reviews.author: hurch @ the Sault

customer_reviews.title: Car never look better
customer_reviews.text: I received the car wax about 3 weeks ago and being very busy did not have the time to utilize it. Well last weekend I have the chance to use the wax. I have never used a car wax that was applied so easily and remove the same way. The cars had a great look and the rain just ran to the ground. Great car wax, will purchase more before the current can is used up.
customer_reviews.author: Skip

customer_reviews.title: Former Zaino user, very happy with Meguiar's Ultimate.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Meguiar's Ultimate Wax product for some time, great shine and it really protects for a long time. I have been using the liquid wax (I am a Zaino convert) and thought I'd give the paste a try. I found the paste much easier to use. I was able to get more uniform coverage than the liquid and left more on the car (and less on the rag) after buffing.
customer_reviews.author: J. Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous
customer_reviews.text: This is a non-cleaning wax, which is what I was looking for. Most waxes are cleaning waxes which means they include a little compound in the wax to remove the remaining dirt and grime from a car that has already been washed. But that also removes the all the protection I already have on the paint previously and which I do not want removed. This goes on easy and shines up without much effort. I highly recommend and the price is good.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: not happy
customer_reviews.text: I think this product is probably very good but when it was delivered to me I opend the box and the melted wax, which was open inside, ran out all over my hands and everything. I'm not too happy about the packaging on this one.
customer_reviews.author: DLM

customer_reviews.title: I need everything of the product. Please, don’t miss anything.
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to get this product when I ordered it. But the wax was already cracked and missing a foam sponge. The sticker of box ripped off already before I open the box. Maybe, someone already might already open the box.
customer_reviews.author: Yuki Matsuzawa

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Shine.
customer_reviews.text: After waxing, the paint feels very smooth and gets a shine like you have never seen. While the wax is a little bit more expensive than some other waxes you might find, I find it worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Heather A.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent stuff. Its been 4 months since i applied ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent stuff. Its been 4 months since i applied and the water is still beading off my car. Only bad thing is i have a clear bra on my car and where the edge of it is has some wax stuck on it. Very slight white color shows. I think if you have to wax your car with a clear bra on it avoid waxing the bra. Or at least avoid where the edge of the bra is.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Nakayama

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't serve it's actual purpose
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this hoping that it would at least work for a few days to keep the dust in my dirt driveway from sticking to my shiny truck along with the occasional rain leaving water spots and I saw no difference two days following applying it after it rained.
customer_reviews.author: selena

customer_reviews.title: Good quality wax
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this paste wax for many years on my vehicles and have been very pleased with the protection it has provided. It is very easy to apply. Most of the effort is in the removal. Once dry it takes some effort to completely remove it. I usually remove it all as best I can on the first pass and then go around a second time with a good quality clean microfiber rag to get that nice final shine.
customer_reviews.author: CaptainPico

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying products from this company for a very long time down from my grandparents until now. I am extremely satisfied with this product I have a Volvo XC60 2020 and brings the shininess and the beautiful color back every time I apply it. I strongly recommended for new and old cars. It’s a little bit pricey but totally worth it it comes with a microfiber I love the size of this product
customer_reviews.author: RedDiscus

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy these defective products.
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy these defective products. When I received it, he was leaked and destroyed.So that there are car wax everywhere
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: An Obvious Differance
customer_reviews.text: Without a doubt, absolutely the best paste wax I've ever used. I could see the difference between Ultimate and the paste wax I previously used for years (Mother's Gold Brazilian Carnauba). Other Ultimate users report longer adherence to the painted finish, as opposed to other paste waxes. The difference I immediately noticed was the higher shine and sharper image reflections after using Ultimate. I'm sold!
customer_reviews.author: Capt. Kirk

customer_reviews.title: Meguiar's Fan for many years, never fails.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, very little residue, easy on, easy off. Hard paste wax finish will leave your buggy very shiny. I also use the Clay Bar and other polishes to rid the clear coat of any swirl marks. Mirror-like long lasting shine. Protect your vehicular investment. Go Meguiar! I also use the detailer in between waxings
customer_reviews.author: Toon

customer_reviews.title: I recommend it!
customer_reviews.text: Good results. My black car always keep shiner and more beautiful using that. It's very good, it cames with the "sponge" (to apply the product over the car). With a cloth your remove the wax to make it nice feel and shine. Also it gives some protection for your car. The water goes easier off your car.
customer_reviews.author: Bernardo

customer_reviews.title: EASY TO USE ULTIMATE CAR WAX!!!
customer_reviews.text: This wax is AWESOME!!! I got some of it on my plastic molding and it came right off without leaving any residue at all. I even waxed over old wax residue on my molding and let it set a spell and it wiped the old residue right off. It gives the car the wet look like no other wax I have ever used before. I'm sold and I will gladly purchase this wax again in the future. I gave this 5 stars because of the ease of use and you can even wax this in the sun and it comes off very easily.
customer_reviews.author: Militarypolice52

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply, long lasting synthetic wax
customer_reviews.text: Meguiar's Ultimate range is great, and this synthetic polymer wax is no exception. It lasts for a long time, protects paintwork, does not stain black plastic (at least not as much), and is easy to apply and remove. It even comes with everything you need to wax the car: a foam applicator to apply the wax, a microfiber towel to remove the wax, and the wax itself. Like others have mentioned, this wax has a chemical vanilla smell to it. While good, the glossy, darkened color effect isn't as prominent as comparable carnauba wax, but the protection appears to last longer. Would gladly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: A. Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Very good protection and shine
customer_reviews.text: Very good protection and shine. The product is removed easily, but sometimes leaves an oily residue/reflection that requires quite a bit of further buffing for removal. For the price it is average in my opinion as the durability of the wax is not much better than much cheaper waxes. Best feature of the wax is how thinly it can be applied which allows you to get many more applications out of the same amount of product compared to brands of paste wax. Much of the value of the product comes from the ease of application.
customer_reviews.author: Chris R.

customer_reviews.title: Save your money
customer_reviews.text: This product is easy to use and looks great...at first. About a week after application the wax seems to have re-hazed over. I had to re-buff the entire car, which took 3 times as much elbow grease. As an avid user of Meguiar’s products I had high hopes for this line, but those hopes were quickly dashed.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Jennings

customer_reviews.title: But this product!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is outstanding! Super easy to apply, came off even easier, and looks amazing. This Infiniti hasn’t looked this sharp since we bought it. Kit came with everything needed. Smell is wonderful but it does saturate the pad and work it’s way into your skin so use sparingly. Only time will tell how long the shine lasts, and I did clay beforehand, but we will see how the water beads.
customer_reviews.author: corey boone

customer_reviews.title: Easy on  easy off
customer_reviews.text: I just applied the wax to a brand new John Deere tractor which has metal,fiberglass,plastic, it worked great on everything. I even cleaned my screen on my cell phone and waxed the glass, my finger slides across just fine.. Next I am going to clean my front window on my vehicle apply a thin application,water and bugs wont stick (a YouTube trick)
customer_reviews.author: Teverk

customer_reviews.title: It went on easy with the provided applicator and wiped off easily with ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this as a final coat on top of a base of Klasse All In One and a coat of Klasse High Gloss Sealant Glaze. It went on easy with the provided applicator and wiped off easily with the included micro fiber cloth. Left a beautiful mirror finish shine. I have used pure carnuba paste wax in the past and was very happy with the results. This exceeds that in every way! Better living through chemistry!
customer_reviews.author: Clark Craft

customer_reviews.title: It works on more than cars.
customer_reviews.text: Yes you are suppose to use this on cars , which I do, but I have found that it is a lifesaver on my tub shower unit. After a good cleaning , I apply a coat of Meguiar's Ultimate paste wax . It is very easy to put on and buff off. No more soap scum. I reapply about every 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Love the water beading and the nice gloss on my ...
customer_reviews.text: A little more difficult to wipe off compared to liquid wax but definitely worth the extra effort. Love the water beading and the nice gloss on my car. Not sure how long the wax lasts, but water still beads after 3 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: MB

customer_reviews.title: Great experience
customer_reviews.text: I'm certainly a fan of Meguiar's products, although this is a first time trying their wax. Results definitely met my expectations and exceeded in some rough spots. I included two before & after shots along with a final fender shot after waxing. Without the need for labeling, the before & after shots speak for themselves. Swirl marks and even some light scratches are abolished after a single waxing with the product. The only negative I have with Meguiar's wax, is it leaves a lot of light dust after use that can be a bit pesky, although nothing to really look down on. I'll be a returning user of their product.
customer_reviews.author: Lundy

customer_reviews.title: Lasts long time
customer_reviews.text: People comment on how new and shiny my car looks, even though I wax once a year instead of every season (I know, I know). The water still beads in rain or a humid morning. Only downside is the smell when I work with it, it can be nauseating but wears off quickly.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence T.

customer_reviews.title: Wax applied nice and easy
customer_reviews.text: So my review on wax Shine: 5/10 Water repelling: 10/10 Application: 7/10 Wiping off: 4/10 In conclusion; Wax applied nice and easy, scrubbing off though took a lot of elbow grease, a huge plus to this wax is when coming in contact with black plastic, does not leave a white mark, just adds a gloss. My review of 10 out of 10 for water repelling comes from post waxing, took me 5 minutes to wash my hands, water refused to stick to skin
customer_reviews.author: Alicia McCready

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Seems a little old school with all these companies and there fancy stuff, but it works like a champ. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST PASTE WAX THERE IS!  WATCH YOUR CAR SHINE LIKE NEVER BEFORE!
customer_reviews.text: My experience with this and many other Meguiar's products would confirm that this is their best paste wax. I have a 35 year-old car with a shine that looks almost as good as new. I would rate this product as the best and the other Meguiar's waxes as next to best. It is a tad expensive, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: JON MEREDITH

customer_reviews.title: Nice luster but no cleaning qualities
customer_reviews.text: Overall pleased with the luster and beading, however having used Meguiar's #6 Cleaner/Wax I prefer that over this. This wax has no cleaning qualities whatsoever, meaning it will not remove a speck of tar or a dead bug like #6 will easily. So car needs to be perfectly clean before using this. Would be nice if they tinted it a little for use on light colors. It is pure white when applied and dries to a white haze.
customer_reviews.author: Logan M.

customer_reviews.title: Smells great but leaked before getting it
customer_reviews.text: Product worked great but was half spilled when it arrived. It was all over the inside of the box, the cloth and the container itself. Due to this, I didn't actually have that much product left when I went to apply it. I don't know if I'll order again because of the price in addition to not having that much left to actually apply, but the product did work great and smelled really good too.
customer_reviews.author: Lori H.

customer_reviews.title: Works -
customer_reviews.text: Went on easy came off easy. It’s been a while since I have waxed a car this way. Old carnuba waxes would turn plastics and rubber white if you got it on them and would barely come off if at all. Accidentally got some on rubber windshield gasket, only made it shine and came right off with microfiber towel.
customer_reviews.author: John Doe

customer_reviews.title: Will definitely buy more 🤩🥰😍
customer_reviews.text: If you care about your car paint and want it to last longer use this. Love the way it look and how the dirt doesn’t stick to the paint making it look gray, after 3 weeks the car is sparkle. 🥰🤩🥳 love it and will definitely buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Jenova

customer_reviews.title: Goes on easily and comes off just as easy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the paste wax. Goes on easily and comes off just as easy. I applied it to a 3 year old Honda Pilot that has never been waxed after using the Gold Class car wash. It put a showroom shine back on the vehicle and that's about all I could hope for. It's pricey, no doubt, but definitely worth it. I let it cure for an hour before buffing off by hand.
customer_reviews.author: NotaHappyCamper

customer_reviews.title: Great Wax
customer_reviews.text: Great wax. I don't think I would buy another kind at this point. Worked extremely well on an old car finish I was trying to revive when used in conjunction with the Meguiar's Compound, then the Polish, then this wax.
customer_reviews.author: mr. ed

customer_reviews.title: Great shine
customer_reviews.text: I used this as part of a system with the other Ultimate line of products. The wax is easy to use and delivers excellent shine and water beading. Be careful not to apply it too thick, or it can take a lot of elbow grease to remove. Time will tell how long it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Maxwell J. Lamouria

customer_reviews.title: Smells as good as it works
customer_reviews.text: Applicator pad makes this so easy to apply and call me crazy, but this wax smells fantastic. Excellent product. We just used it on a custom paint job we did on a 49 Chevy, made the perfect paint job look even better.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Different from my other waxes.
customer_reviews.text: This product is definitely not up to the meguiars standard. It feels gritty, and didnt clean up nearly as well others. I also felt like a lot of product was used just for my small two door vehicle. Wont be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: J.Ambrose

customer_reviews.title: Favorite car wax
customer_reviews.text: As always, in my opinion, meguiars provides the best car care products. This wax is by far the best I’ve used. Mothers, griots, etc are great but if you have a show car or just want the best looking and longest lasting, go with meguiars ultimate wax.
customer_reviews.author: Sstewart95

customer_reviews.title: Well rounded car wax!
customer_reviews.text: After seeing the Chrisfix video recommending this, I went ahead and got this. This was my first time hand waxing a car and I’m very pleased! It left a few streaks, but that’s due to my inexperience and not the product. Made my paint shine like a mirror and water seems to bounce off of it! I can’t speak much for the longevity, but according to the other reviews it should last a long time!
customer_reviews.author: Jarod S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: This is my 2nd tin of this wax. I love it. Easy on and easy off. Just a light layer to your clean paint. Clean like after clay and cleaner wax. Apply light layer only. After each wash, use the ultimate quick detailer to maintain the wax. Works great! Only will have to wax once every 6months
customer_reviews.author: Alroundj

customer_reviews.title: Worked GREAT on my new car!
customer_reviews.text: Used this product on my new car and it was amazing! Easy to apply -- and can be applied in the shade. Comes off easily and leaves an awesome shine! Water just beads up on it and rolls off! I also bought the Meguiar's cloths to remove the wax and it was a great combo.
customer_reviews.author: Arleen

customer_reviews.title: It was opened and used
customer_reviews.text: When the package came, the box is opened and clearly the cloth has been used.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Super shiny!
customer_reviews.text: Car looks amazing! I wish I'd read more about how to wax properly before using -- it can get into nooks and crannies and be hard to remove the whiteish look of it, but when buffed in it's AMAZING.
customer_reviews.author: TY

customer_reviews.title: Works perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Accidentally scrapped the right side of my car on the gate. Some of the first layer came off so I decided to give this a try. The packaging was really impressive but the wax worked really well. Easy to apply and comes with a cloth. I would suggest that you use the provided cloth to apply onto the surface of your car. Then use another part of the cloth to finish! Worked for me!
customer_reviews.author: Jh

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I'm tired of paying high price for detail every now and then while not getting the proper finish. I got this product thanks to a YouTube video that showed how great it can take off light scratches. Super happy customer
customer_reviews.author: Obarel

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic wax
customer_reviews.text: This product is one of the best on the market if you're not the kind who wants to win ribbons from car shows. Even then, everyone passing bye would be hard pressed to tell the difference between this and one costing 3x as much. Comes with an application pad and it easy to get out. Not a hard paste and not too oily
customer_reviews.author: Animal

customer_reviews.title: Great wax
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use but feels like it does not stay a long time on the car. I usually wax my 69’ vette the same day of a car show, looks amazing the same day. Following day is not the same... Love the shine and smell when freshly on
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: Top notch!
customer_reviews.text: This wax was a real pleasure to use. It spread easily, smelled excellent, and produced a very slick surface that had a great shine. I really enjoyed the opportunity to wax my vehicle again, and would recommend this to anyone. It seems to last about nine week's.Which is great for the price imho. Just try it you won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua W.

customer_reviews.title: Top product from a top company
customer_reviews.text: Cannot go wrong with Meguiar's products. They work better than expected. They last longer than expected. They are the most cost-effective products you can think of purchasing for your vehicle. This lasts about six months in constant sun and elements. Makes my car look like a mirror. The only drawback is it can be very difficult to get off. Takes a lot of elbow grease... But, boy is it worth all the work...
customer_reviews.author: Todd Ruble

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: It leaves beautiful glossy finish. Everyone keeps asking if the truck is new and when I tell them that it is 13 yrs old, people do not believe it. The product is amazing. I have been using Meguires for yrs
customer_reviews.author: Mario A Ortega

customer_reviews.title: Applicator was missing?
customer_reviews.text: I think they must have sent me a used one, because that circular pad-like applicator was missing on delivery. I tried using a microfiber cloth but it's not effective.
customer_reviews.author: Amber Choo

customer_reviews.title: Best wax I've ever used and I've used them all.
customer_reviews.text: I've used Mequiar's products for years but nothing they have ever made surpassed all my expectations like Ultimate Past Wax. It will amaze you and will make you happy each and every time you wash your car, the water will bead off like you've never seen before. Summer is almost over, order a can of this wax now and prepare that ride for winter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best wax I have used
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. hardly any dust residue and goes on easy. The only drawback is that it does not last as long as other waxes. Outside of that, fantastic
customer_reviews.author: Jack Tup

customer_reviews.title: This is probably the best wax I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is probably the best wax I've ever used. This wax applies nicely, and also comes off fairly easily. In addition, the finish it leaves is excellent. I would recommend this car wax over just about anything else.
customer_reviews.author: Dini

customer_reviews.title: Even Better
customer_reviews.text: I just got a brand new car. The finish (wax) on it was pretty damn good, but I wanted to see if I could protect the car even more for winter. I put the paste on it and what was good just got great. Strong recommendation.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Spieldock

customer_reviews.title: Meguiar's Paste Wax
customer_reviews.text: So far it's an excellent product. I waxed the car a a few weeks ago so I do not know long it will last, but I have never been disappointed with any Meguiar product.
customer_reviews.author: Roman Swiercz

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Best wax i ever used! Clean, clay bar, then use this wax, car will sparkle for months. Easy to apply faster then most waxes used for years and worth the extra money in time savings alone.
customer_reviews.author: M. Cenicola

customer_reviews.title: Shiny
customer_reviews.text: Seems to work really good. Kinda dries too fast. Once I was able to wipe off the wax it made the paint really shine. Good product.
customer_reviews.author: 71Grande

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant shine
customer_reviews.text: As with any paste wax it requires some work. This went on better than Turtle wax that we have used for years and was easier to buff to a shine. Definitely recommend and will buy again although the paste does seem to last.
customer_reviews.author: Old-always learning

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wax for scratch
customer_reviews.text: This wax made my car like new. I sanded and polish the surface of my car and I applied this wax and it feels so smooth and glossy. This wax came with a pad and a towel which was a huge plus to me. Also, the wax is well packaged and actually bigger than the picture. Just as described and came just on time.
customer_reviews.author: JohnK

customer_reviews.title: On and Off easily.
customer_reviews.text: On and Off easily. Shine does not appear to be any better than a regular paste wax. Only time will tell if it lasts.
customer_reviews.author: RussTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: High quality wax that's easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Goes on easy comes off just as easy couldn't ask for a better wax it doesnt leave white on plastic trim shines it up nice also. Will be using this from now on.
customer_reviews.author: austin dritz

customer_reviews.title: This product was recommend by several web sites for the amateur
customer_reviews.text: This product was recommend by several web sites for the amateur. It went on easy, the shine looks great and does not leave white residue behind.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy on and easy off.
customer_reviews.text: I am fastidious about maintaining a high gloss finish on my cars. This product does a great job and is very responsive to my use of a DA orbital polisher. I typically "wax" my cars once a month, or more as conditions may require, and this "wax" seems to hold up well between waxings. Excellent product and worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Klein

customer_reviews.title: Yes. Just get this wax.
customer_reviews.text: It takes a bit of work to remove once dry. What's the saying, "Nothing of greatness comes easily" or something? It's not so bad, but I wouldn't want to wax an RV with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Phillip Mai Spinnaker

customer_reviews.title: Top notch - became a fan of Meguiar's products
customer_reviews.text: Amazing what it did to my 2011 VW CC. Used 7424XP polisher, Meguiar's Mirror Glaze Ultra-cut compound, and applied Meguiar's Ultimate Paste wax. The car was already good looking for its age to naked eyes before, but it shines at night like a brand new car.
customer_reviews.author: Shon C.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product very much, I used it with the polish which is a great combo and it got rid of the scratches on my hood. The product came in a nice box with a rag and the sponge and wax duo. Awesome product
customer_reviews.author: Omar Gudino

customer_reviews.title: It’s a good wax for the money
customer_reviews.text: This so far is the best wax I have found for the price it will last about 4 months on my truck
customer_reviews.author: t wilen

customer_reviews.title: ... applications on a new black auto and it shines great. Easy on
customer_reviews.text: I did a couple applications on a new black auto and it shines great. Easy on, easy off. The trick is to wait 24 hours between applications and a little goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Krom

customer_reviews.title: Quality Car Wax
customer_reviews.text: Great product compared to some other car waxes I have tried. This one will be a repeat purchase for me.
customer_reviews.author: Jake K

customer_reviews.title: Very Good Wax
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply. Easy to take off. Leaves a waxy feel. Shines well and repels water. Recommended.
customer_reviews.author: MovieFan

customer_reviews.title: Produces a very good glossy and lasting shine
customer_reviews.text: Produces a very good glossy shine - like new. Seems to last... it's been on for 3 weeks now through rain and sun and still looks the just as shiny. Much better than all other brands we have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Laverta Dauterman

customer_reviews.title: Simply one of the best car wax in the market
customer_reviews.text: After claying and waxing with this makes flies literally slip off from the surface. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Haejoo

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased with this product!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply and buff off! I waxed my "Mango Tango" Jeep Cherokee Trailhawk a month ago and am very satisfied with the way the water beads up on the car. The shine is fantastic as well. So far, so good. I am planning to put on a 2nd coat in the next few weeks to get through the New England winter.
customer_reviews.author: Dave Jag

customer_reviews.title: Wax on, wax....
customer_reviews.text: Great price! Comes with a nice pad for applying the wax and has a little plastic insert to keep the wax away from the pad when not in use. The wax itself is easy to wipe off when dry.
customer_reviews.author: Don from IT

customer_reviews.title: Looks like New!
customer_reviews.text: After claying and polishing with Mequiar's ultimate compound, the ultimate paste wax restored the shine I had when I first purchased my car. None of the scratches or swirles remained in the black clear coat.
customer_reviews.author: Aleph

customer_reviews.title: Meguiar's Ultimate Paste Wax
customer_reviews.text: Works great for me, comes with sponge to apply wax and a good sized microfiber towel for cleaning up. Goes on like most wax and cleans up with minimal dust/flakes unlike some other brands. Also wipes off rubber trim without leaving visible residue behind.
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Good Wax but incomplete!!
customer_reviews.text: I loved the wax! My container wasn’t full. Also I didn’t receive a applicator and still haven’t today!!!
customer_reviews.author: Gerald Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Good wax
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't come with that much wax, but it's an excellent wax and easy to apply
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Great product.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent car wax. It goes on well and shines to a mirror finish. I'll buy it again for sure. Fair warning- this stuff is good, solid wax and pretty firm in the tin. It takes a bit of effort but really worth it. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: R. Collins

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding...
customer_reviews.text: My truck's paint beads beautifully after using this. Easy on, easy off.
customer_reviews.author: Mongo

customer_reviews.title: The only wax I'll use
customer_reviews.text: Really good synthetic wax. Goes on and wipes off much easier than a traditional carnauba wax. I'm really anal retentive about my car, my 2006 Acura TSX still looks brand new and this wax protects my paint quite well. I recommend this wax to friends and family, so far everyone that has tried it absolutely loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: While the synthetic takes a little more time to apply & buff - and is at the high end on price - it is by far the best car wax I
customer_reviews.text: I've tried em all. While the synthetic takes a little more time to apply & buff - and is at the high end on price - it is by far the best car wax I've used. High gloss shine, long lasting if you use a duster, and great repellent. Definitely my 1st choice now.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin F

customer_reviews.title: I used this wax once and it worked well. ...
customer_reviews.text: I used this wax once and it worked well. However, it was a little more difficult to remove than I expected.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Francis

customer_reviews.title: Will never use another wax!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best wax I have ever used! Covered and camouflaged scratches. It rained this evening and it beaded right up. So easy to apply and remove. Plus it smells really good! Customer for life!
customer_reviews.author: Careful_193

customer_reviews.title: It's ok
customer_reviews.text: Decent wax. It has a fairly low melt point and doesn't seem to hold up well to the heat after application. But sure makes the car look nice for a week or two.
customer_reviews.author: Randall W

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: This wax is great. Comes off fairly easy, and seems to last well.
customer_reviews.author: Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff. It goes on pretty easy
customer_reviews.text: Great stuff. It goes on pretty easy, removes pretty easy...and best of all does not seem to stain molding or anything else. Protection seems to hold up pretty well, I think it is a pretty high end product.. The only stuff I have used better is twice the price, but bang for your buck this is probably the winner right now.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron Colona

product_meta.title: MEGUIAR'S G18211 Ultimate Paste Wax - 11 oz.
product_meta.description:
Meguiar's Ultimate Paste Wax uses Meguiar's Thin Film technology to deliver our easiest application and removal, even if you have to wax in full sun! Meguiar's proprietary Hydrophobic Polymer Technology increases surface tension so water beads and rolls right off. We've re-set the bar for car wax with a pure synthetic wax that provides extended protection with amplified reflectivity for incredible depth & mirror-like shine.

AMAZON.COM
Meguiar’s Ultimate Paste Wax features Meguiar's ThinFilm technology, which makes it the easiest wax to apply and remove; even in full sun. Its advanced, synthetic wax polymers provide extended protection with amplified reflectivity.
feature_bullets: ONE EASY STEP: Formula delivers maximum synthetic protection, durability, depth of color, and reflectivity in this easy one step
EFFORTLESS APPLICATION: Thin Film technology provides for easy application and wipe off even in full sun
LONG-LASTING PROTECTION: Advanced synthetic polymers crosslink to form a long-lasting protective barrier while amplifying reflection for incredible depth and mirror-like shine
WATER ROLLS RIGHT OFF PAINT: Hydrophobic Polymer technology increases surface tension to protect paint
SAFE AND FLEXIBLE: Safe and effective on all glossy paints and clear coats, and can be applied by hand or dual action variable speed polisher like Meguiar's MT300 Dual Action Polisher

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,372 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
